cast.overview: One man's campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after he is revealed to be a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.
cast.title: The Beekeeper

details.biography: Pedro Minas is a multilingual Swiss-Brazilian actor based in London. He is most recently known for guest starring on FBI: International as well as his involvement in Amazon's The People We Hate At The Wedding (2022). He is set to appear in the upcoming David Ayer directed film The Beekeeper (2023) alongside Jason Statham. Minas has wrapped filming on a BFI funded feature film and is co-producing an independent comedy series.
details.name: Pedro Minas
